SELECT tj.visit_state, tj.actual_visit_time, tj.visit_count, tj.case_count, tj.visit_people_count, tj.average_visit_count, tj.average_case_visit_count, tj.family_visit_count, tj.oneself_visit_count, tj.noaddress_visit_count, tj.remove_visit_count, tj.noone_visit_count FROM (
SELECT vr.actual_visit_time,vr.`state`,vr.`visit_state`, COUNT( vr.id) AS visit_count, COUNT(DISTINCT vr.case_id) AS case_count, SUM(func_get_splitStringTotal(vr.visit_user,',') ) AS visit_people_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(SUM(func_get_splitStringTotal(vr.visit_user,',') ), 0)/(IFNULL(COUNT( vr.id), 0)),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS average_visit_count, CONVERT((IFNULL(COUNT( vr.id), 0) / IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT vr.case_id), 0)),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS average_case_visit_count, SUM(CASE WHEN vr.`visit_state` = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS family_visit_count, SUM(CASE WHEN vr.`visit_state` = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS oneself_visit_count, SUM(CASE WHEN vr.`visit_state` = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS noaddress_visit_count, SUM(CASE WHEN vr.`visit_state` = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS remove_visit_count, SUM(CASE WHEN vr.`visit_state` = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS noone_visit_count
FROM `visit_record` vr LEFT JOIN case_info ci ON vr.case_id=ci.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = ci.`batch_id` WHERE vr.`state`='4'
and actual_visit_time BETWEEN '${params.actual_visit_time}' AND'${params.actual_visit_time1}'
GROUP BY vr.actual_visit_time ORDER BY ci.create_time DESC ) AS tj WHERE tj.state='4'
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by actual_visit_time desc
